SqlQuery.Data: SELECT acknowledgment.notes, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, acknowledgment.initials FROM event LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) RIGHT JOIN acknowledgment on (acknowledgment.sid = event.sid AND acknowledgment.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment_class on (acknowledgment_class.id = acknowledgment.class ) AND acknowledgment.timestamp > @0 AND acknowledgment.timestamp < @1 GROUP BY acknowledgment.notes, signature.sig_name
